post.body: Umm...read a book!!
Another entry in To-Do List then!!
Yeah, thats what i am putting my hopes on..lol!! (sent to my own tweets instead of reply)
Then I believe I need to try it more. Should not judge too soon.
Yeah, more you work on it, more you will discover. I tried my hands on Java few days back. Its a nifty language, but annoying.
Try Ruby, I am loving it!!
I have some vacations coming up, may be I could learn some of this stuff. :D It sure sounds cool to me.
So you generally work on AJAX mostly? I know no head and tail of it, although would like to learn.
Google sure does some cool stuff!!
Awesome!!
Can it translate Chinese to English?? :D
Nice, In that case, I must out that too!! Good Morning (non sarcastic). :D
Yes, thats what I am putting my hopes on..lol!!
We feel bad when something cherished ends....time to move on!! to bigger and better things!!
Lots of Mob Wars today!!
Instant Pasta!!
Algorithms give Headache!!
Breakfast ready!!
Good Night World for a few hours!!
Black Hole in Milky way - http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/science/nature/7774287.stm
A new days started!!
